# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/mjml-core`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for mjml-core (https://mjml.io).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/mjml-core.
